textBeforeTable: The total rainfall value 0 (zero) may indicate that there has been no such measurement and / or the weather station does not broadcast. If in the average or annual total of some data is missing information of 10 or more days, this is not displayed. To calculate annual averages, we analyzed data of 365 days (100% of year).
